meta.name: description
meta.content: El Centro Elementary School District has 12 schools in it's district in El Centro, CA.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1090px; height: 666px;

div.br: Starting Monday, April 6th, we are going to single day serving of meals. We will distribute enough food for 5 days every MONDAY between 11:00 am to 1:00 pm. By regulation, you may only receive one breakfast and one lunch per child per day, this includes food services at other school districts. Note that the district will now be using cameras to record all activities at our serving sites for the protection of our workers and to ensure the regulations of the program are followed by participants.

div.div: A partir del lunes 6 de abril, vamos a servir comidas un solo día. Distribuiremos suficiente comida durante 5 días todos los LUNES entre las 11:00 a.m. y la 1:00 p.m. Por reglamento, solo puede recibir un desayuno y un almuerzo por niño por día, esto incluye servicios de alimentos en otros distritos escolares. Tenga en cuenta que el distrito ahora usará cámaras para grabar todas las actividades en nuestros sitios de servicio de alimentos para la protección de nuestros trabajadores y para garantizar que los participantes sigan las normas del programa.

div.a: Haga clic aquí para más información

div.div: Please check back often. We are regularly adding more learning resources to our page. Click on the link below to access the resources.
Parents, Google Classrooms are available for all our students during this closure. These Google Classrooms are available for those students not currently enrolled in a Classroom with their teacher.

div.a: Parents' Ultimate Guide to Google Classroom

div.div: This message is a reminder that all the schools and offices are currently closed due to the COVID-19 Pandemic and will remain closed until the end of the school year or until the Governor lifts the shelter in place order. This week we are on Spring Break, but starting next Monday, April 20th, although our facilities will be closed, learning will still be happening through distance learning. Please visit this website regularly or follow us on Facebook to stay informed!
Please visit the Inter and Intra District Transfers website to read about the updated protocols.
Distribution location and time: 2370 W. Main St in El Centro. 9 AM to 3 PM
Distribution precations: Practice social distancing and wear masks.
